content.detailedDescription: Riding to loranger and i was watching 2 planes to see if they were leaving chemtrails and this shiny silvery metallica object just appeared behind the plane. it sat in place for about 20 secs n vanished before i could get my phone out to take a picture. planes were not leaving chem trails tho. i was somewhat excited because i see these things like this a few times a year.
content.summary: Appeared behind plane stayed in place for 20 secs then vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife,son, & i just returned from picking up our suv from getting an oil change. when as soon as we pulled up into the driveway, i noticed something unusual in the sky. as my wife got out of the suv and i got out of the other car, she began to reach for our son in the carseat, when all of a sudden i noticed this strange black/greyish ball just hovering in the sky. from my perspective, it was in the same direction of the moon. i asked my wife, "what is that?!" i got her attention, and she said "what?" looking at me. i said, "look! look there, do you see that black ball?" she says "yeah, i see it." and i said, "what the heck is that? it's just sitting there!" i turn around quickly to grab my smartphone from the carseat, and as i look back, the object was gone. after that happened my wife took our son inside, but i stayed outside to try and find it. i turned around slowly 360 degrees and the object was nowhere to be found. as i was looking around i spotted what appeared to be a jet at a higher altitude off to the far left and it looked like it was using its afterburners. as soon as i looked back at the jet seeing that it was even further, i noticed an object that looked like a long black line, almost cigar shaped, heading in the same direction as the jet, but at a lower altitude, and as i watched it, it seemed to disappear right in front of me. then it just completely vanished out of site.

the attached photos have been manipulated to show what i saw, and are in no way geniune photos of the actual ufo's. i was unable to capture the ufo at the time of viewing, but i used the photos to give a view of what i saw.
content.summary: Mid-day dark hovering objects over kyle tx

content.detailedDescription: Four red-orange glowing orbs flying over kranj (slovenia, europe) on new years eve beetwen 22.00 and 23.00 cet (gmt +1) followed by another one same in shape, colour and size. went out on a balcony on the 7th floor when i saw it coming from the nw toward se. it was flying (moving) in one direction, passed by quite fast.
content.summary: Five red-orange glowing orbs flying over kranj (slovenia, europe)

content.detailedDescription: I wrote in last year and was contacted by someone who's name i have forgotten, but was never able to get back to them. i had a phone loss and number change and was never able to find the number that contacted me . i apologize for not getting back to you. please feel free to contact me anytime .
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Hovered-chased  above our car on the highway

content.detailedDescription: For 2 nights  consecutivly multiple objects wear spotting hovering and changing course. it continued for hours. i began noticing lights in the woods where lights dont normally shine. the lights would shift in color from red to orange. when i first noticed the lights i focused a pair of binoculars on one of them and i saw 3 or 4 greys. one of witch was much taller than the others. as soon as i noticed them the light went out. through out the evening the light would go on and off again. i didn't notice a particular pattern. at first i was creeped out and quite scared. quickly a calming came over me and i had a conversation with the entities. it was nothing more than an introduction and small talk. i viewed the entities from my pourchc. i felt like i could  walk into the woods and have been fine but i was to chicken the event went well into the night. i got sleepy and went to bed.  i haven't gone into the woods to investigate. i don't want to disturb anything and i don't want possible radiation sickness. thank you mufon
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Multiple craft. persisted for two evenings. landing. greys spotted near the house in the woods.

content.detailedDescription: A friend was driving up washington to western and he saw the very  bright lights and they went from blue to green to white he pulled in the driveway ran inside and grabbed us and we went outside and saw 6-8 very bright lights all of a sudden the white lights started going up (because they had been still) and then it was like we blinked and they were gone. then a bit north of those lights we say a super bright red light. oh the pic i got was right before the lights were gone. the lights started moving up i grabbed my phone got the pic and then the lights were gone. the red light kind of floated up and that is when i noticed the sound of the military jets it sounded like there were two of them. i tried taking a pic of the red light but the pics turned out black. the red light went straight up. i left the house to come immediately and by the time i had gone from the corner of washington and western to the corner of cherry and lambert my girlfriend called me and said the red light was back and then was gone the same way the first one took off.
content.summary: Saw 6-9 very bright lights in the sky snapped a photo and you could tell the lights were all part of the same object. it was gone in a blink.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home @ around 10:15 p.M. last night 1/1/2012 on i-75 heading northbound. when i was 1 mile south of the miami gardens drive exit i looked up and there were 10-13 red orange orbs hovering stationary over the road about what seemed to be 100 miles up. at first i thought they were red paper lanterns, but it was clear to me after observing them for several seconds that they were not anything common. others had pulled over to look @ theses things. i wanted to call the fhp offive in "plantation" to report them and to find out if anyone else had seen them. instead i came online to find where i could report this sighting. please let me know if anyone else has reported this. it happened and it was real. i am a healthy 35 year old male with no history if insanity or phsycological issues. this was real. this is the first time i have seen this with my own eyes. what is going here? if there are government experiments or actual ufos we need to be told. this was real. i do not have a cell phone so i could not take any pictures, but others had pulled over to look at them so i'm hoping they had taken pictures of these red orange orbs. i hope you have recieved other reports such as mine. again...This happened last night @ around 10:15 p.M. over i-75 (northbound) 1 mile before "miami gardens drive" exit.  i wrote the number of witnesses to be 7. there were others pulled on the side of the road but i cannot give you an exact number, i did not pull over. i drove in slow lane looking up @ these orbs and noticed other cars pulled off to the side and peopel looking observing.
content.summary: Driving home on i-75 @ around 10:15 p.M. about 10-13  red orange orbs about 100 ft above i-75 before 1 mile before you arrive @ miami gardens drive exit.  "believe it!!!"  other pepole had pulled over to look @ them. it was real!!!!!

content.detailedDescription: Hi my name is pete  i live in union beach nj 3 45am i seen a bright circle  object in the air pass my window it was so fast i can;t tell you its speed but its faster then a plan would go thank you for your time laying down on the counch
content.summary: Bright white circle object

content.detailedDescription: I took the dog outside and was sitting on the steps when an orange/red light flew in a strait, unwavering line, across the sky. i stood up and walked out to the street to follow it's path. it was obscured by trees but i was able to see it for a few more seconds. it was totally silent. i'm guessing it was lower than a jet flies. i'm not sure, but i think the light was rectangular in shape and orange with red edges.  it brought to mind a japanese lantern, the cylinder shaped type, but as if it were laying sideways-meaning that it was longer horizontally than vertically.  my first thought was that i was seeing a firework, but because it continued on until it was far away, i discounted that notion, but have never seen anything like it before.
content.summary: Reddish orange light flew north across sky

content.detailedDescription: On dec. 31, 2011 around 8 pm, two friends and i observed a series of 4 bright   golden yellow lights moving across the perfectly clear night sky.  i had gone outside to view the night sky prior to leaving for a new year's eve celebration.  after viewing the first one, i asked my friends to come out and see the others.  they were moving from the north to the southeast.  they appeared to move at the speed and altitude of a small private plane.  however, they were not the right color to be either landing lights or red and green navigation lights.  the entire object appeared to be illuminated.  they traveled at the same speed and in the same direction approximately 30 seconds apart.  they made no sound  as they traversed the sky.  as a point of reference, commercial airliners were also visible, traveling much higher, displaying conventional lights and making normal jet sounds.  several minutes after the first four passed across the sky and traveled out of sight, a fifth, single one also appeared following the same path.
content.summary: Bright golden lights moving across sky about 30 seconds apart

content.detailedDescription: Hovering over buildings facing south austin looking toward downtown. appeared to have a pulsating or rotating light white, blue, red.. but colors hard to make out. very much resembled a star and mostly hovered. was moving however too fast to be a star. it had moved about 3-4 degrees further away westward in the sky and further away south. the light went from very bright to more and more faint and smaller harder to make out.
content.summary: Hovering over buildings facing south austin toward down town. appeared to have a pulsating or rotating light white, blue, red.. but colors hard to make out. very much resembled a star and mostly hovered. was moving however too fast to be a star.

content.detailedDescription:
At 6:36pm i was walking to the cabin-home i am occupying when i looked at a bright star to the north of me at about an 80 degree angle or so up from me. it appeared to move slowly at first which gave it the appearance pf hovering. i ran back to the house i was visiting, yelled out "ufo" but no one else came out to observe it. 

that house is about 102 ft or so from where i was at. i ran back but it seemed that it was still in the same spot but it started to move again, this time a little faster.

i ran out to the front yard and observed the craft move towards the seti compound but more to the south east of where i was standing. it started to pick up speed and shoot out between two stars part of a constellation and as i knew and expected it to do, it disappeared from sight. it was wonderful to see because i have moved and also to receive the messages they have been giving me since june of 2010 again.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright star like craft with two points

content.detailedDescription:
I learned about this sighting dec. 16, 2011 but saw no report on the mufon cms website.  as i am a fi in northern michigan residing in cottonwood, az for the winter season, i thought i should try to see that the sighting got reported.  i was able to speak with two of the witnesses on december 20th, 2011 about their sighting.
they do not have a computer, but were agreeable to my making a report on their behalf.
on december 24th, 2011 i placed a report on the sedona, az website, but to date have heard from no one.
the couple described a chevron-shaped object(in fact one of the witnesses drew a sketch of it for me)with five bright lights underneath that changed colors from red-white-green-blue when they were leaving a cottonwood resturant at 7:30 pm.
they were not able to estimate its size as they did not know the distance from them.
it traveled in one direction fairly rapidly out of sight .
content.summary: Chevron-shaped ufo seen by three witnesses when they were leaving a cottonwood resturant.

content.detailedDescription:
Duck, nc (currituck county, obx nc approximately 1 mile north of army corps of engineers pier)
sitting on 3rd floor deck at beach house in duck nc prior to nye celebration looking up at a very clear night sky stargazing...Three identical very bright red orange orbs appeared slowly from north sky in a straight line formation at 11:22 p.M. dec 31, 2011. in the night sky they appeared very close, but don't know how many feet away they might be or how large they might be. our first reaction was "what is that???"  did not have a clue as to what we might be seeing other than maybe fireworks, but there was no sound, smoke trails or any sign of gravity and the orbs were bigger and brighter than anything witnessed in the night sky in the 30 plus years we have been coming down here to the beach. the 3 orbs made a triangle formation directly in front of 5 of us and hovered approximately 2-3 minutes. almost like a light show.  all 5 of us just stood staring at the orb formation and saying "wow, oh wow, unbelievable, freaky, how cool, this is really just incredible."  bottom right orb started slowly fading rapidly and going out in to night sky southward, then dissappeared from view. the other 2 remaining orbs followed in the same southerly direction one behind the other disappearing to the southern sky. not falling, just going out into the night sky.  we were all pretty amazed and freaked out at what we had witnessed and kept asking one another what each had seen in the sky to make sure we were all witnessing the same event. after ringing in the new year we went back out on the deck to get a breath of air and at approx. 12:15 1/1/2012 two red orange orbs appeared in the northern sky.  these did not appear to be as close as the first sightings were. they hovered approx 1 minute and then one started rapidly disappearing into the northern sky and the other in to the northwest sky. we all felt pretty comfortable seeing them on the second sighting, and were somewhat disappointed that they disappeared so quickly.  still don't know how to describe the phenomena.  none of us are ufo buffs and we never really discuss ufo's, but we all felt pretty privledged to have witnessed what we felt like was a genuine ufo sighting. we called the local news channel 1/1/2011, but they said they had no clue of what we had witnessed, nor did they have any information concerning the sightings.  we checked the internet by looking for "strange or unusual lights in night sky in north carloina 12/31/2011" and found that many people had seen the red orange orbs displaying similar characteristics and actions  that we had  witnessed, all over the usa and canada on 12/31/2011 and in to 1/1/2011. many had digital images showing the same type of orbs we had witnessed here at duck.
content.summary: 3 orange globes appeared straight line from north, hovered in triangle formation, one by one rapidly headed south, disappeared

content.detailedDescription: So me & my little bro & sister were outside my aunts house since it was new years 2012, hmm i suppose sometime between 12:00 a.M thru 12:15.. we were outside on the street when we were watching fireworks down the street, when one red glowing fireball one appeared, it stood out since me & my brother waited about 5-10 seconds for what we thought was a firework to explode, but no.. & thats when me & him started 'tripping out' asking 'wtf is that' at 1st we thought it was a firework but we saw other fireworks going off fast.. but then we saw it kinda going towards us not literally to us.. but our direction.. and as it started getting closer we saw it was or had 3 orange/red kinda fireballs inside so then we said 'holy sh!T ' lets go lets go "" and yeah it dissapeared right infront our eyes, of course my little sister whos 2 doesnt know what that is. but since im 16 & my brothers 9, we knew that definitely was not a firework, unfortunately i didnt think of recording the thing with my ipod camera... darn :| either way, i know its not a firework & yes i'm traumatized :o
content.summary: Fireball looking red gaslight with 3 orange colored orb looking fireballs

content.detailedDescription: Driving on route 78e in nj some where between exit 25-12). saw 3 equally spaced solid bright lights in the sky with one bright light above and hovering over the furthest to the left. they were stationary for a long period of time. also saw planes in the sjy these lights were different. other witnesses in the car also saw them.
content.summary: Rt.78e nj

content.detailedDescription:
This was the third and fourth time i have seen this ufo, and was able to film them.  i have seen the same object at least two other times.

the first time we noticed the object, it was earlier in 2011 (may or april) at around midnight.  it pulsated and lit up and wobbled, wiggled back and forth and went every which way for about 10 minutes.  we even reported it to marion county sheriff department.  by the time the sheriff arrived, the object disappeared into the west.

around 12/15/12 i was sleeping with my window open.  at about 5 am i was awoken by a bright light pulsating above our neighbor's house. i was very scared and told myself it wasn't really happening, but as i thought about it more and looked up, it very much so was there and real. so i got up, went to my window and looked at the object for about 3 minutes making sure of what i saw. i then went into the bathroom and made sure my eyes were adjusted to the light. when i returned it was still there, it was really close and stayed about another 2 - 3 minutes.  the object was similar to the object(s) i have seen prior but much closer, brighter and active.

after that event, i decided to purchase a hd video camera that would capture the object at night.  i then checked the sky more frequently at times i had seen it prior and making sure it wasn't a star,planet or other identifiable object.
 
then on 12/26/11, at about 8pm i walked out of my house and looked to the western sky where i have seen the object(s) before and to my amazement, there was the/a pulsating light above the horizon. i right away ran inside and grabbed my video camera and captured the light in the night sky. i was very nervous, so the video wasn't the best, but i did capture as much as i could. the light hung around for about 5-7 min moving in different direction and then slowly disappeared going west towards the gulf of mexico.

six days later on 1/1/12 i decided to check the sky at the time i have been seeing it, like i do regularly now, and it again was in the western sky. being less scared this time i grabbed my camera and videoed it, about 5 min, till it disappeared to the west the same direction it always goes.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Strange pulsating light in western sky over central florida (4th time in 6 months)

content.detailedDescription: We went outside around 9:30 p.M december 31st, 2011, we looked up and saw 3 bright red-orange lights flying in a distance sw of coral springs florida. they were very noticable, there was nothing else in the sky that bright. at first we were thinking they were airplanes but they were moving too slow, the lights were not blinking, and by how close they were together we knew they couldn't be airplanes. there were 2 on the top and one on the bottom. they were moving west plusating for about 10 minutes before they just dissapered.
content.summary: saw 3 bright red-orange lights in the sky. saw them sw of coral springs florida.

content.detailedDescription:
Happening right now. can view the ufo in the eastern sky of tucson. numerous smaller ufos surrounding a larger one.

watching it in the sky change shape and colors.

called news stations and they show no interest. neighbors see it as well.
content.summary: My brother called to tell me about  the ufo. i then saw the object in the sky outside my front windows.

content.detailedDescription: I observed 2 ufos at the same time, one was a disc with a somewhat coiled snake trail with red and blue lights and the other was boomerang shaped. when i arrived at work i showed my boss and we both took pics and video and compared them they was exactly the same. i didnt want to report anymore but i thought they would go away.
content.summary: Took puppy out before work and observed 1 ufo on the left side of the moon and the other one was over the pa line

content.detailedDescription: I came outside to see why the dogs where barking, they stopped when i opened the door, very typical. =) i live in the country where city light dont effect my wonderful view of the stars. so i stood on the ramp to the porch and was looking around when i noticed a very bright orange light over the horizon, right over the tree line. i thought it might had been a helicopter because of how it was hovering, so i opened the door to tell my 7yo son to come look, since he likes to watch and listen to them go by. but as it got closer i noticed it had no sound, as it past directly over us i saw it in good detail. it was cigar shaped, i couldn't tell the color as it was dark. neither of us saw wings but there were 2 sets of 2 white lights on each side of the craft. they flashed but a lot slower that airplanes lights do, it had 3 oval window like things on the very bottom and their was a soft yellow light coming through them. i told my son that i didn't think it was helicopter, and it kind of looked like an airplane, my creative son said it was a space craft looking for us. it continued on without sound, i didn't watch it very long after as it is really cold and i had to get my son inside. after an online search showed no airplanes or anything like this i decided maybe i should report it in hopes of maybe someone else seeing it or having a similar account, or even knowing what it was. thanks =)
content.summary: Bright orange light over tree tops, craft passed over us, had windows on bottom.

content.detailedDescription:
Started approx 2230 12/31/11 while shooting fireworks on roadway nothing
above 100ft. son in law commented on two red lights in sky moving from
ssw to north northeast, these occurred over 10 to 20 mins (1st 8 orbes)
nothing for 45-50 mins then 6 more (0100 01/11/12) moving ssw to northeast
(one orb passed directly over head (my home) no sound at all). most orbs
traveled in pairs at about the speed of a commercial airline. please call, i can not explain all details or have someone come by. these orbs where not fireworks!!! too fast and too high. most orbs traveled under the cloud cover with some traveling thru or above clouds. of the tandems one pair of the
last 6 orbs, one orb broke from the tandem and headed westerly (90 degree
change of direction) 

lighting was round reddish in color mostly solid non pulsing, however
an orb would seem to flicker or pulse during the latter occurrences

we thought it was space debris coming thru atomsphere, however, no
tail for reentry. secondly, thought drones of some sort, alvin calender
airfield is south southeast of hammond (approx 50 + air miles) no flashing 
lights as on a airliner. 


puzzled as to what we where seeing, did not feel threatened.

the orbs traveled beyond line of sight (increased distance)
content.summary: 14 red orbes traveling ssw to n to nne, one traveled directly over house no sound, one broke from tandem  to travel westerly

content.detailedDescription: Celebrating new year with my fiancee parents and 2 neighbors we where outside the house , at midnight the ligths of some houses went out ,were some fireworks lighting the sky but were well located , in some moment my sister in law shouted and said hey look at the sky , we looked up , i saw west of orion  2 lights one was rotating left since the other was doing to the right , because i was watching fireworks it took me some seconds to focus it properly , the orange lights begun to move northbound ...Becuase i flew in costa rica , i know that at this time there is no overflying commercial aircrafts , an d no local traffic at all , so we continued to cheer up and light some little fireworks , and after 5 minutes a orange light came from south in a straight line moving constantly due north , because i am a airline transport pilot i know the nav lights , it flew west of orion , the 7 saw it , going north bound it become to fade ...It was at 0600 utc jan 01 -0630 utc jan 01 ,2012.
content.summary: Celebrating new year on the costa rican sky , we saw 2 orange lights first , no planes on the area , west from orion , they moved northbound during this movemnet the brightness begun to fade ...After some minutes a orange light came from the south moving

content.detailedDescription:
Photograph taken on xmas day, from coyle park, point chevalier, auckland, new zealand.

apparent position of object: -36.851982,174.703774
position of photographer: -36.851982,174.703774 facing west

object was not seen, only noticed once the photograph was viewed later.

sea birds were in the vicinity, and had appeared in shots taken from another vantage point facing east, however none were noticed in other shots taken within seconds of this photograph.
content.summary: Photograph of ufo

content.detailedDescription: Last night around 11:30-11:45 just before midnight 2012 a party of five of us witnessed a ufo in houston, tx in the se side of the city. we were on the balcony patio of my apartment with a great view of the sky looking to the west from the se side of houston in la porte. it had 6-7 bright lights in the shape of a circle spinning around in all directions not just from left to right. it also had a spotlight that seemed to extend about 20ft out from it that would come on at random times. it was going all the way up to the fog and flying fast across the se area. the lights were changing from red, blue, green, gold, and white. it was amazing. i was looking thru my telescope viewfinder and could see the lights clearly spinning in formation in a perfect circle but there was nothing in between the lights or the center of the aircraft. we had binoculars as well. five of us saw it and a friend of my girlfriend at another house was looking at it and may have gotten video. i'm going to see if it comes out again tonight. never seen anything like it. it was either some amazing very large remote controlled device or a real life ufo. but based on the fast darting speed, nothing seen in between the lights or in the center and that it hovered at times in one place and went up to the clouds it had to be out of this world. i hope it comes again because i have my camera ready. it was only there several minutes, went down in the horizon and a few moments later came back up for several more minutes. the lights spun left to right and up and down and at angles. it was nuts! i can't find any remote controlled devices like that anywhere online. it wasn't a jet, plane or helicopter. i see those all the time around here. also, based on how plane's look in the sky from our patio this thing could have been as big as a plane or slightly bigger.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo spinning in all directions with 6-7 lights with a spotlight beaming going all the way up to the clouds and down again

content.detailedDescription:
At aproxamently 0005 hours on the date of 01/01/2012 my father, sister and i stepped out to watch fireworks the the nighbors were setting of for new years. we were looking to the west and noticed what we thought was a flare that was shot off, there are hills just west of us....It was not a flare as i have seen theme plenty of times. the object was redish orange in color and was like a fire ball and appered to just float. it gave off no nosie nor did it emit any rays beams or have a tail. 
   
     for about 10 secands or so it just hoverd over the hills, then it slowy moved to the north looking like it was floating, it moved about 200-350 feet to the north as it moved it never changed shape or dimmed or got any brighter. it then just stoped and disspared it was a constent glowing pulsateing...It had no vissable structure and i nither of us could notuce any windoews or any other lights that it may have had.

    prior to the event for about 2-3 hours my two outside dogs were wimpering and barking non-stop trying to get into the house...All the other dogs in the nighb orhood were barking non stop as well. my min-pin who stays inside did not want to get out of my arms. after the abject dissapered my dogs and all the nighborhood dogs setteled doen aise from just barking at the fire works and gun shots.

   my father, sis amd i were not affected by the object..Other then thinking wtf is that.

   sight was lost of the objsect when it just appered to just dissapear.
content.summary: Looked like a flare from a flare gun...It was redeish orange and appeared to glow and pulsate.

content.detailedDescription:
I was out on my back porch in between new years' eve events - i happened to look up and saw a large faraway spread of three red/orange lights moving in formation in a line, hovering for a bit, then continuing on past my house out of view.  i've never seen anything like it and don't see how it could've been jets, planes or helicopters.

the next day i was looking around for news of it and didn't find much but a mention in the examiner of a simiar sighting at the same time of two lights.  that brought me to mufon where i discovered case 34478 which i'm pretty sure is of the same entities.
content.summary: 3 intense red-orange lights moving in formation

content.detailedDescription: I went to meet my parents for dinner in clermont and am from kissimmee. last night my dad meet some neighbors on a hill to watch all the fireworks from the theme parks and all saw several orange fireballs in the sky almost above them around the same distance a jet would be. i've seen some ufo's before (zig zag across the sky and crazy bright lights) so i believed him and am mindful of it. before i left i looked things up on twitter and youtube and saw a small response to what he saw last night, with a few videos posted and posts on twitter about it. when i left it was dusk and saw a bright orange looking fireball to the east, to me it looked around the downtown area or past it, but it was low and the trees easily blocked it until i was up on a hill. as i continued to drive down 27 to reach 192 i saw it a few more times above the trees. i stopped once and got out google sky and checked, it was not a star, and no other stars were visible along the same level. i may have also saw another one to the south-west, but wasn't sure and couldn't look in two directions at once while driving. compared to the photos i saw on twitter/videos on youtube, it is a similar object in the sky.
content.summary: Stationary fireball in sky two days in a row

content.detailedDescription: Witness wishes confidentiality.
content.summary: Three bright lights which formed a huge triangle and hovered

content.detailedDescription: It was 5:15pm new years eve, tampa in seminole heights. i let our dogs out & i sat on our back deck looking at the trees & sky facing the east. a bright white dot appeared suddenly appeared to the east about seventy degrees from horizon line. i watched it for about 30 secs & it didn't move at all. i quickly grabbed the binoculars from right inside the door, always looking up:). i looked back to the same spot & didn't see it any longer. i looked through the binoculars & found it, i focused & another 30 secs or so  passed then another appeared. another two minutes passed, my arms stared to tingle, the second one just disappeared as it had appeared. the first one still hadn't move any further away & in the same spot. i looked away couldn't see anything with my naked eye, i then found the original again through binoculars & watched for another minute or so & it seemed to start to slowy get smaller. it lasted for about 5or 6 minutes total.  both of the objects were round & seemed to pulse with a bright fire like yellowish glowingness. i only felt happy & thankful to see these orbs...I waved, said hi and wished they'd come on down.
content.summary: Glowing orbs to the east in tampa
